name: Traking Goals
author: Memo Palomas

sections.description:
• Description: This plugin allows you to create a goals for Google analytics, and Facebook of predetermined lead type events for telephone links, direct access links and e-mail.

For backwards compatibility, if this section is missing, the full length of the short description will be used, and
Markdown parsed.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/Goals-for-Facebook-and-Google-analytics directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. if you have already installed the google analytics GA code, and the Pixel facebook code, you be able to see the goals
